classic.name: Classic Set
classic.info:
The classic set demonstrates the basic intransitive property with three simple dice.

Each die will win against the next with approximately 5/9 (56%) probability.

tooltips.A-B: Die A beats Die B about 5/9 of the time (56%)
tooltips.B-C: Die B beats Die C about 5/9 of the time (56%)
tooltips.C-A: Die C beats Die A about 5/9 of the time (56%)

efron.name: Efron's Dice
efron.info:
Created by mathematician Bradley Efron, these four dice form a non-transitive set.

Die A beats B, Die B beats C, Die C beats D, but Die D beats A, creating a cycle.

Each die beats the next with a 2/3 (67%) probability.

tooltips.A-B: Die A beats Die B about 2/3 of the time (67%)
tooltips.B-C: Die B beats Die C about 2/3 of the time (67%)
tooltips.C-D: Die C beats Die D about 2/3 of the time (67%)
tooltips.D-A: Die D beats Die A about 2/3 of the time (67%)

oskar_new.name: Oskar Dice (New)
oskar_new.info:
A custom set of 7 dice with calculated relationships between each die.

This set demonstrates intransitivity - where relationships between dice form cycles rather than a linear hierarchy.

tooltips.A-B: Die A beats Die B about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.A-C: Die A beats Die C about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.A-E: Die A beats Die E about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.B-C: Die B beats Die C about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.B-D: Die B beats Die D about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.B-F: Die B beats Die F about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.C-D: Die C beats Die D about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.C-E: Die C beats Die E about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.C-G: Die C beats Die G about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.D-A: Die D beats Die A about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.D-E: Die D beats Die E about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.D-F: Die D beats Die F about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.E-B: Die E beats Die B about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.E-F: Die E beats Die F about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.E-G: Die E beats Die G about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.F-A: Die F beats Die A about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.F-C: Die F beats Die C about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.F-G: Die F beats Die G about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.G-A: Die G beats Die A about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.G-B: Die G beats Die B about 55.6% of the time
tooltips.G-D: Die G beats Die D about 55.6% of the time

miwin.name: Miwin's Dice
miwin.info:
Miwin's dice are a set of three dice that form an intransitive loop.

Die A beats die B with probability 17/36 (47%), Die B beats Die C with probability 17/36 (47%), and Die C beats Die A with probability 17/36 (47%).

What makes this set special is the equal probability (17/36) for each comparison, creating perfect symmetry.

tooltips.A-B: Die A beats Die B about 17/36 of the time (47%)
tooltips.B-C: Die B beats Die C about 17/36 of the time (47%)
tooltips.C-A: Die C beats Die A about 17/36 of the time (47%)
